'''Yumemiru "Kuukai" Street Lamp''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Yumemiru "Kuukai" Street Lamp is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest south of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Shirikoro Peak]] at [[Oina Beach]] on Tsurumi Island. It is normally available on the second day of Tsurumi Island's [[Tsurumi Island#Three-Day Cycle|Three-Day Cycle]]; however, it is possible for Remarkable Chests to appear on different days if the cycle becomes desynced.
